member.name: P:Fantomas.Client.Contracts.FantomasResponse.SelectedRange
member.summary: The actual range that was used to format a selection. This can differ from the input selection range if the selection had leading or trailing whitespace.

member.name: P:Fantomas.Client.Contracts.FormatSelectionRequest.Range
member.summary: Range follows the same semantics of the FSharp Compiler Range type.

member.name: P:Fantomas.Client.Contracts.FormatSelectionRequest.FilePath
member.summary: File path will be used to identify the .editorconfig options Unless the configuration is passed

member.name: P:Fantomas.Client.Contracts.FormatDocumentRequest.Cursor
member.summary: The current position of the cursor. Zero-based

member.summary: File path will be used to identify the .editorconfig options Unless the configuration is passed
